content: >http://www.spiegel.de/international/0,1518,457942,00.html Two 'Americans' have been stripped of citizenship and deported after their service with the SS as prison camp guards came to light. Both were long-term residents who had failed to disclose their service when they immigrated. Another American, John Demjanjuk, who had been deported and tried by an Israeli court in a case of mistaken identity, was to be extradited for trial in Germany, on different charges, in the near future.
reply: >http://www.spiegel.de/international/0,1518,457942,00.html Two 'Americans' have been stripped of citizenship and deported after their service with the SS as prison camp guards came to light. Both were long-term residents who had failed to disclose their service when they immigrated. Another American, John Demjanjuk, who had been deported and tried by an Israeli court in a case of mistaken identity, was to be extradited for trial in Germany, on different charges, in the near future.
title: Paying for War Crimes
